title: Closer Than I Appear
desc:
Post 2240
- Draw a <:red:1106234051129507932> card, and discard a non-<:red:1106234051129507932> card if you have one.
- You may play another card after this one.

Post 2241
**Speak Three Times** (<:red:1106234051129507932>)
- The next player draws 1 card.
- If this was your third card played this turn, the next player draws 3 more cards.

Post 2242
**Confirm Suspicion** (<:yellow:1106234135384699023>)
- Look at the next player's hand.
- Then, guess a number. If they have a card with that number, they draw two cards, then discard a card with that number.
